import dayjs from 'dayjs'; import Icon from 'erxes-common-ui/lib/components/icon'; import { __ } from 'modules/common/utils'; import React from 'react'; import { ContentBox, ErxesContent, LeftSide, RightSide } from './styles'; function GreetingContent() { return (

{__('Recent conversations')}

  • {__('Start new conversation')}

    {__('Talk with support staff')}
  • {dayjs(new Date()).format('LT')}
    {__('User')}

    {__('We need your help!')}
); } export default GreetingContent;
